Edges-Warlock-Witch -- Male Human Seasoned Warlock/Witch
Attributes (8 Points):
Agility: d4 Smarts: d12 Spirit: d6 Strength: d6 Vigor: d8
Skills (14 Points):
Athletics: (agi) d6 Performance: (spi) d4 Stealth: (agi) d4
Common Knowledge: (sma) d4 Persuasion: (spi) d4 Survival: (sma) d4
Healing: (sma) d4 Riding: (agi) d4 Taunt: (sma) d4
Intimidation: (spi) d4 Science: (sma) d4
Notice: (sma) d6 Spellcasting: (sma) d10
Skill Notes: All Thumbs: Suffers -2 using mechanical and electrical devices; critical failure breaks device
Size: 0
Advances: 4 Improvement Points: 12 Improvement Points Allocation: Attribute: 6; Edge: 4; Skill: 2
Features
Edges (3 points): Arcane Background (Warlock/Witch); The Evil Eye; The Witching Hour Hindrances: All Thumbs; Death Wish; Pacifist; Shamed Human Abilities: Adaptable
Feature Notes:
Adaptable: +1 Edge Points
Arcane Background (Warlock/Witch): Has Armor Interference+, Corruption+, Coven, Familiar, Magic, Material Components+, and Prepared Powers features
Death Wish: Will risk death for a valued goal
Magic: May take edges particular to Arcane Background (Magic)
Shamed: Past event causes self-doubt
The Witching Hour: Gains free Soak and cannot critically fail between midnight and 1 a.m.
Combat
Parry: 2 (0) Cover: 0 Toughness: 7 (1) Pace/Run: 6/+d6
Armor: Robe With Hooded Cloak Shield: None Weapons: Blowgun (d4-2 R3"); Composite Bow (d6+d6 R12" AP 1); Shuriken (d6+d4 R3"); Unarmed (d6+d0)
Combat Notes:
Vigor Toughness Modifier: +4
Pacifist: Will harm others only when no other option is available
Arcana
Power Count: 3 Power Points: 10
Common Power Modifiers: +1/+2/+3 PP Armor Piercing; +2 PP Fatigue; +1 PP Glow/Shroud; +2 PP Heavy Weapon; +1 PP Hinder/Hurry; +2 PP Lingering Damage; +1/+2 PP Dbl/Tpl Range; +1 PP Selective
Arcana Notes:
Arcane Background (Warlock/Witch): 3 Powers/10 Power Points
Armor Interference+: In light, medium, or heavy armor, suffers -4 arcane skill rolls and cannot use arcane edge features
Corruption+: Critical failure on arcane skill inflicts additional or increased hindrance until next advance
Coven: R12" May freely transfer PP w/other coven members
Familiar: Can communicate w/a magical, Wild Card pet that stores 5 Power Points
Material Components+: Suffers -4 arcane skill rolls when materials are unavailable; critical failure exhausts materials
Prepared Powers: May use hex bag to cast 2 prepared powers/dy w/out spending PP; critical failure empties bag
The Evil Eye: R6" Target Bennies have no effect (Spirit-2 neg) for the remainder of the encounter 1/encounter
